title: Random Parkour
briefDescription: Play with your friends and try to be the first who claimed 5 points to win .You can play from 1 to 30 players without any lag or ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Play with your friends and try to be the first who claimed 5 points to win .
You can play from 1 to 30 players without any lag or a problem>scoreboard .
And you can play with texture packs and addons with no issues because the map only made with less than 20 commands to evict the lag .
What is this ?
This map is a mulitplayer and solo parkour map .
The map recreate a random possible parkour every time you pass a level .
The map can handle over 20 players moving in the same time because it only has less than 20 command block .
How I play ?

When all players are ready to start click on the ?Start game? button and the map will make a random parkour in 0.3 second after that you and your friends will get teleported to the parkour and try to beat it first to beat get a point after that the map will keep creating random parkours until someone claim 5 points .
When you claim 5 points you?ll win after that the map may take from 3 to 6 seconds to reboot himself .
You can play the map over 100 time without any problems .
Is the parkour possible?

title: Breaker VS Runner ? MAJOR UPDATE!
briefDescription: Breaker VS Runner is a fun little minigame map made by EatNYeet, PointFixed, and magicexplosion9. So if you're looking for a little uncommon minigame of ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Breaker VS Runner is a fun little minigame map made by EatNYeet, PointFixed, and magicexplosion9. So if you?re looking for a little uncommon minigame of its own concept, this is for you!
Breaker VS Runner is a map with 2 roles: Breaker and Runner. The Breaker?s goal is to make the runner fall, whether it?s by punching them into surrounding lava or breaking the bedrock near the Runner. You may hit the Runner off, or you may break the blocks beneath their feet. The fun part about being the Breaker? You get to be invisible! So not only are you attempting to kill all Runners, you get to troll them in almost every way you can imagine! I admit, it?s kind of like The Floor Is Lava, but it?s still pretty fun with the stopwatch and the effects!
The Runner?s role is self-explanatory, but to sum it up, you pretty much just avoid death. Not enough description for you? Well, the Runner gets Speed and Jump Boost 10 to help them! Be careful, though. They can be both a blessing and a curse. There is also a stopwatch in seconds (Your XP bar) for each individual Runner so that you can compare times alive as well! See who?s better at surviving!
Once you die as a Runner, you get sent to the spectating area! You can spectate the rest of the match and watch your other friends struggle to avoid falling off, maybe even see them do some cool tricks or see hilarious deaths! Almost anything goes!
Bored with the map? Well, grab some more friends! This map will support as many players as Minecraft allows! Want a small twist? Have multiple Breakers and less Runners! It makes for good fun. ? Also, please note that sadly, yes, breakers are actually able to break the map, so please don?t do it! It ruins the game for everyone. There?s nothing to see outside of the map. Also, please note that I use a texture pack, so you may not get the exact same results as I did when taking screenshots.
Arena
Bottom of the map

title: The Killer
briefDescription: The Killer is a minigame for minecraft bedrock in a multiplayer format. To play there must be a minimum of 2 players. If you are innocent ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The Killer is a minigame for minecraft bedrock in a multiplayer format. To play there must be a minimum of 2 players. If you are innocent you must survive until the end. If you are the murderer you must kill everyone.
There will be 5 players. 4 of them will be innocent, and 1 will be the murderer.
You will have 5 minutes to survive or kill.
The map is inspired by among us although I am working on a minecraft version of the game.
The murderer will have invisibility but he is seen with a skull, while the innocent will have speed to escape

title: Parkour Grid
briefDescription: Parkour Grid is my second map, and it's my biggest project yet! This is a parkour map with 100 mini levels that slowly get harder as ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Parkour Grid is my second map, and it?s my biggest project yet! This is a parkour map with 100 mini levels that slowly get harder as you complete the map.
Parkour Grid is a parkour map with 100 mini levels all built on a 10?10 grid.
The average gameplay time can be about 2 hours long! (This is a huge map)
This map works in singleplayer and in multiplayer.
You?re allowed to record YouTube videos off of this map.
Thank you guys so much for 10,000 downloads!! This is a huge achievement!!!

title: ONE IN THE CHAMBER
briefDescription: One in the Chamber in a classic game best known from Call of Duty and other shooter games. Now, it's in Minecraft! In this map ...

crawledImageUrls.text: One in the Chamber in a classic game best known from Call of Duty and other shooter games. Now, it?s in Minecraft! In this map you have a ONESHOT bow, which can kill a player in a single shot, but you only get one arrow, so use it wisely! You also get a stone sword to use once you have used the arrow. So don?t worry (too much) if you miss your shot.

title: Black Lake Camp (Hide & Seek)
briefDescription: Black Lake Camp is a new hide & seek map. The goal of the hider is to hide in the Black Lake Camp away from the ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Black Lake Camp is a new hide & seek map. The goal of the hider is to hide in the Black Lake Camp away from the seeker. The seeker is released is 1 minute after the game starts. The seeker?s mission is to kill all the hiders, if you really want you can set your own timer and when that timer ends the players that are left over have won.
Screenshots:

There Are 7 Different Places To Hide:
1. Cave
2. Camp Site
3. Camp Fire
4. Toilet
5. Forest
6. House
7. Lake

title: Void | TheBridge (1v1 ? 2v2 ? 3v3 ? 4v4) [MiniGame]
briefDescription: This map is a TheBridge Minigame map inspired by Hypixel Network (TheBridge Duels). But, This map is based on 2 teams limited to MIN: 1 Player per ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This map is a TheBridge Minigame map inspired by Hypixel Network (TheBridge Duels). But, This map is based on 2 teams limited to MIN: 1 Player per team and MAX: 4+ Players per team.
The objective of The Bridge is to cross the 1-block-wide bridge from your base to your opponent?s base and jump in their portal to score a goal. Each time a teammate jumps into the opposing team?s portal, your team scores a point and all players are re-spawned at the starting gates. Note that the map does not reset each round, all the blocks that you build will stay on the map until the end of the game! The first team to score 4 goals wins.
SCORE GOALS
DEFEND YOUR GOAL
CLUTCH IF YOU FALL

title: Tic Tac Toe 2020
briefDescription: We all know game tic tac toe and we all played this game on peace of paper. Naw you can play this game in minecraft. ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
We all know game tic tac toe and we all played this game on peace of paper. Naw you can play this game in minecraft. It is first version, so there can be bugs, but its amount is very low. There?s only one rule: have fun!
I`d like to present you my first map.
Features:
* Map made for Bedrock 1.16+
* Very easy installation! Just open the .mcworld file and the game will install the map itself
* Fully working mechanism
* The presence of crosses and zeroes (not all maps have them)
* Beautiful lobby
* Maximum number of players 2

title: Jockeys Showdown 1V1 [PvP]
briefDescription: This time I made a PvP map! But, it's a special one! Because you will be riding a Strider the whole fight! If you try ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This time I made a PvP map! But, it?s a special one! Because you will be riding a Strider the whole fight! If you try to get off your strider, you will be transformed into a burnt steak by the lava below you!
Short Information about the map:
This is a 2-player map. Although you can still play this map with 3 or more players, but it will be too crowded since the battle arena is very small, designed only for 1 VS 1 PvP game.
Each player will receive a stone sword, and a bow with 5 arrows, protected by a full set of iron armor. Each player will fight to their death while riding a Strider the whole game! Note that the Striders are immortal, and cannot be controlled, so you have to navigate and move from one Strider to another, so you can dodge your opponent?s attacks! More information are in the map.

Since this is a minigame, it is recommended that you play with others, like friends and/or family.

title: Ultimate Minecraft Masters

Complete these 7 levels and kill the ender dragon to win. In this world, you have to pass 7 different levels and you can do it with endless friends. It doesn?t need any mod.Good luck!!!!

We recommend to play with 5 players, but if you want you can do it with more!
You don?t need any mod!
In this find level, you have to find a button, but to find it you have some parkour
At this level, you have to pass all the lava because there are invisible blocks in there.
See the roof!

This labyrinth has a mob that chases you to the end. Run!!!

title: Bingo In MCBE v1.8.3- Competition of Collecting
briefDescription: This minigame requires players to collect items shown on their Bingo Cards, and you will enjoy the entertainment of collecting and competition. It supports 1-4 ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This minigame requires players to collect items shown on their Bingo Cards, and you will enjoy the entertainment of collecting and competition. It supports 1-4 teams and it?s time to show your survival skills!
Bingo in MCBE is a minigame that supports at most 4 teams to compete. The goal of the game is to collect items shown on your Bingo Card, you can randomize it by a button and toggle the game modes:Lockout mode and Line mode. Once you reach the goal or get a line of items you win. The map was translated from other language and it has been downloaded over 2,5million times before this version came out. The map can be played for several times, but I still suggest you to redownload it after playing for a few times.

title: Who Knows Me Better?
briefDescription: In this game one person asks a question about themselves and the other people have to answer. If they are right a light flashes. If ...

crawledImageUrls.text: In this game one person asks a question about themselves and the other people have to answer. If they are right a light flashes. If they are wrong they get dropped into the void. Very fun party game! Fun with a lot of people. But only 2 people needed.
